text:
e="preserve">Sherrelwood is a census-designated place (CDP) in Adams County, Colorado, United States. The population was 18,287 at the 2010 census.
Geography.
Sherrelwood is found at (39.840722, -105.001540).
According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of, of which is land and, or 0.88%, is water.
